Ate at Cornelia and Co. on a trip to Barcelona.  This was the best restaurant we ate at.  Great menu with attention to the details.  They also catered to allergies by taking the time to talk to the kitchen about gluten and lactose.  Staff was very detailed and friendly.  The food was excellent.  I suggest the mojitos to start!  Then try the scallop appetizer.  Ecological burgers were excellent to.  Menu is diverse with appetizers and dinners that are not served anywhere else in Barcelona.  Very unique place.I did not catch the waitresses name, but her brother is also a chef at the restaurant.  Excellent service and knowledgeable of all the entrees.  This is a must for a Barcelona visit.
